Name: Across
About the game: A STORY TO BE TOLD AND A WORLD TO BE DISCOVERED After waking up not knowing what happened a lioness cub tries to find her owners with the tracks that they left behind not knowing that it will lead her to a journey that will challenge her and know what happened to her owners. Discover the land of Flihela that is filled with windy plains, crimson red forest and snowy ravines all through the eyes of a lioness cub, and a little girl who just lost her precious furry friend blaming herself for what happened. You as the player will take on this journey with the lioness cub also followed by a mysterious bird, to know what happened to the family and where are they. SAVE THAT IS FROZEN FROM TIME Bring back the creatures of Flihela from these mysterious shrines. FRAGMENTS OF TIME Pick up the fragments of time that will show you the past.
